sentences.sContent: Sarah can be quite vicious at times.
a vicious personal attack on the Duchess
sentences.sCn: 对公爵夫人恶毒的人身攻击

sentences.sContent: She was shocked by the vicious tone in his voice.
sentences.sCn: 她对他恶毒的语气感到震惊。

synos.tran: 恶毒的；恶意的；堕落的；有错误的；品性不端的；剧烈的

phrases.pCn: n. 恶性螺旋形上升；[经]恶性通货膨胀螺旋

remMethod.val: vice(邪恶) + ious → 邪恶的； 恶毒的

trans.tranCn: 恶的, 不道德的, 恶意的, 刻毒的, 堕落的, 品性不端的, 有错误的
trans.tranOther: very unkind in a way that is intended to hurt someone’s feelings or make their character seem bad
